quote: I can't stop door knocking or cold calling until someone says yes that day.
why_clipworthy: It highlights the relentless mindset needed for success in real estate.
suggested_hook: Discover the relentless mindset that drives top real estate agents to success.

quote: I sold that home last year for $150 million, all because I doorknocked and stayed in touch.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates the long-term value of consistent relationship building.
suggested_hook: How a simple doorknock turned into a $150 million sale.
